english.segment1: It's cold outside. Or is that just the chill I feel inside from standing here. Steeping in my shame. I can't deny. I'm surrounded by the very thing You freed me from. That's why I can't come home
english.segment2: Chorus: I don't know where I turned around. From chasing what I always found completed me. More than I could dream. I don't know why I can't remain. Safe here where I always came to meet with you. And You always met with me. And You're still here waiting
english.segment3: I fail to see. Why You'd still be waiting to forgive me. After all that I have done. But I cannot say. That one time I returned and You had turned away. Your love never fails
english.segment5: You say, "Come home" and You'll be there. I can run into Your arms
